sqlMap.select: select pm.program_id AS programId,ptd.semester_code AS semesterId,pch.program_course_key AS programCourseKey from program_master pm,program_course_header pch,program_term_details ptd where pm.program_code = #programCode# AND pm.program_id = ptd.program_id AND ptd.semester_sequence = #semesterSequence# AND pch.program_id = pm.program_id AND pch.branch_id = #branchId# AND pch.semester_code = ptd.semester_code group by program_course_key;
select semester_code as finalSemesterCode from program_term_details where program_id=#programId# and final_semester_code='F';
SELECT division FROM cgpa_division where #CGPA#>=min_cgpa_value and max_cgpa_value>#CGPA#;

select pcd.course_category AS courseCategory, cm.course_classification AS courseClassification, cm.credits AS credits from program_course_detail pcd join course_master cm on pcd.course_code = cm.course_code and pcd.course_code = #courseCode# group by pcd.course_code;
select value from system_values where code='FSTUID' and university_id=#universityId# for update
sqlMap.insert: insert into enrollment_personal_details (registration_number,enrollment_number,student_id,student_first_name,student_last_name,father_first_name, primary_email_id,date_of_birth,category_code,entity_id, program_id, branch_id, specialization_id,mother_first_name,nationality,status,gender ,session_start_date,session_end_date,creator_id,insert_time) values (#enrollmentNumber#,#enrollmentNumber#,#studentId#,#studentFirstName#,#studentLastName#,'XX', 'XX','9999-01-01',#category#,#entityId#, #programId#,#branchId#,#specializationId#,'not available','Indian','ACT',#gender#,#sessionStartDate#,#sessionEndDate#,'manualProcess',now());
sqlMap.update: update system_values set value = #value# where code='FSTUID' and university_id=#universityId#;
sqlMap.select: select * from student_program where enrollment_number=#enrollmentNumber# and roll_number=#rollNumber#;
sqlMap.update: UPDATE student_program set program_completion_date=#semesterEndDate#,current_semester=#semesterCode#,program_status=#statusStudentProgram#, modification_time=now(),modifier_id='manualProcess',division=#division#,passed_from_session=#passedFromSession#,passed_to_session=#passedToSession# where enrollment_number=#enrollmentNumber# and roll_number=#rollNumber#;
sqlMap.select: select roll_number as rollNumber from student_registration_semester_header where roll_number=#rollNumber# and session_start_date=#semesterStartDate# and session_end_date=#semesterEndDate# and entity_id=#entityId# and program_course_key=#programCourseKey#;
sqlMap.update: UPDATE student_registration_semester_header set register_Date=#registrationDate#,number_of_remedials=#noOfRemedials#,status=#statusSRSH#,modification_time=now(),modifier_id=#creatorId#, roll_number=#rollNumber#,session_start_date=#semesterStartDate#,session_end_date=#semesterEndDate#, attempt_number=#attemptNumber#,total_credit_earned=null,sgpa=#currentSemSGPA#,weighted_percentage=null,student_process_status='REG', register_due_date=#semesterStartDate#,entity_id=#entityId#,program_course_key=#programCourseKey#,registered_credit=#registeredCredit#, registered_theory_credit_excluding_audit=#registeredTheoryCreditExcludingAudit#, registered_practical_credit_excluding_audit=#registeredPracticalCreditExcludingAudit#, registration_credit_excluding_audit=#registrationCreditExcludingAudit# where roll_number=#rollNumber# and session_start_date=#semesterStartDate# and session_end_date=#semesterEndDate# and entity_id=#entityId# and program_course_key=#programCourseKey#;
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO student_course (roll_number,program_course_key,semester_start_date,semester_end_date,course_code,orginal_course_code, course_status,student_status,insert_time,creator_id,attempt_number,course_group,entity_id,course_name) VALUES (#rollNumber#,#programCourseKey#,#semesterStartDate#,#semesterEndDate#,#courseCode#,NULL,'REG',#studentStatus#,now(),#creatorId#,'1',#courseGroup#, #entityId#,(select course_name from course_master where course_code=#courseCode# and university_code=#universityId#));

INSERT INTO student_marks_summary (university_code,entity_id,roll_number,program_course_key,semester_start_date,semester_end_date, total_internal,total_external,total_marks,course_code,internal_grade,external_grade,final_grade_point,insert_time, creator_id) VALUES (#universityId#,#entityId#,#rollNumber#,#programCourseKey#,#semesterStartDate#,#semesterEndDate#, #internalMarks#,#externalMarks#,#cummulativeMarks#,#courseCode#,#internalGrades#,#externalGrades#,#cummulativeGrades#, now(),#creatorId#);
sqlMap.update: UPDATE student_marks_summary set internal_grade=#internalGrades#,external_grade=#externalGrades#,final_grade_point=#cummulativeGrades#, modification_time=now(),modifier_id='manualProcess' where roll_number=#rollNumber# and program_course_key=#programCourseKey# and course_code=#courseCode#;
sqlMap.select: select course_classification as courseClassification,credits from course_master where course_code=#courseCode#
select enrollment_number as enrollmentNumber from student_master;
sqlMap.update: UPDATE student_master SET date_of_birth=#dob#,father_first_name=#fatherNameEnglish#,father_middle_name=null,father_last_name=null, mother_first_name=#motherNameEnglish#,mother_middle_name=null,mother_last_name=null, modifier_id='nameUploadProcess',modification_time=now(),name_in_hindi=#studentNameHindi#, father_name_in_hindi=#fatherNameHindi#,mother_name_in_hindi=#motherNameHindi# WHERE enrollment_number=#enrollmentNumber# AND parent_entity=#entityId# AND university_code=#universityId#

UPDATE enrollment_personal_details SET date_of_birth=#dob#,father_first_name=#fatherNameEnglish#,father_middle_name=null,father_last_name=null, mother_first_name=#motherNameEnglish#,mother_middle_name=null,mother_last_name=null, modifier_id='nameUploadProcess',modification_time=now(),name_in_hindi=#studentNameHindi#, father_name_in_hindi=#fatherNameHindi#,mother_name_in_hindi=#motherNameHindi# WHERE enrollment_number=#enrollmentNumber# AND entity_id=#entityId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT course_group as courseGroup FROM program_course_detail WHERE program_course_key=#programCourseKey# AND course_code=#courseCode#;
SELECT component_code as internalGrades FROM system_table_two WHERE group_code='GRADEP' AND component_description=ROUND(#cummulativeGrades#) AND university_code=#universityId#
